response.answer_text: Even I too got the same doubt and I have surfed many websites and I found a lot more subjects…. I'm giving a choice to select it by urself Popular Fields of Study Health Science: Nursing is one of the more common health science topics, but this field includes plenty of other options as well. Microbiology, nutrition and emergency medicine are just a few examples. Check out these introductory courses to learn more about popular health science fields:Fundamentals of NursingIntro to MicrobiologyThe Science of NutritionFundamentals of CounselingEngineering: In an engineering program, you might learn how to design automated machines or build state-of-the-art computer systems. Here are a few resources on engineering disciplines that may peak your interest:Structural engineeringComputer engineeringAutomotive engineeringForeign Language: Studying another language can give you the opportunity to fully immerse yourself in another culture. You learn not just the words and grammar, but how another country functions and all the things that make it unique. You have a wide spectrum of languages to choose from, allowing you to pick the one that interests you the most. Computer Science. Cause I learnt it. And am still learning. AS I have not done the same for other subjects I cant tell for the others. I think it depends on your taste. Just because Someone said subject X is the best doesnt mean that it is the best. Everyone is biased and no one has read all the subjects. So I don’t believe there is any impartial answer possible for this question. So my partial answer is CS. Hope that helps.
